Plot: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, and uncover a sinister history.
Title: The Haunting in Connecticut
Actors: Virginia Madsen, Kyle Gallner, Elias Koteas, Amanda Crew
tomatoConsensus: Though it features a few scares and some creepy atmosphere, The Haunting in Connecticut ultimately relies too much on familiar horror cliches to achieve its goals.
